pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, August 8, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montréal, Quebec

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement. A media availability will follow.

CAE Corporate Headquarters
8585, chemin de la Côte-de-Liesse

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should arrive no later than 1:00 p.m.
